eu.play_project.play_eventadapter.api

Interface RdfSender

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSenderRest

    public interface RdfSender

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getNotifyEndpoint()
      Get the current notify endpoint.
      void notify(org.event_processing.events.types.Event event)
      Send an Event to the default Topic.
      void notify(org.event_processing.events.types.Event event, String topicUsed)
      Send an Event to a specific topic.
      void notify(org.ontoware.rdf2go.model.Model model)
      Send a Model to the default topic.
      void notify(org.ontoware.rdf2go.model.Model model, String topicUsed)
      Send a Model to a specific topic.
      void notify(String notifPayload)
      Send a String payload to the default topic.
      void notify(String notifPayload, String topicUsed)
      Send a String payload to a specific topic.
      void notify(String notifPayload, String topicUsed, String notifMediatype)
      Send a String payload to a specific topic.
      void setApiToken(String token) 
      void setDefaultTopic(String defaultTopic)
      Set the default topic to be used when no topic is specified with a notify method.
      void setNoNetworking(Boolean offline)
      For debugging purposes: do not actually send a notification if set to true.

        void setApiToken(String token)

      • notify

        void notify(org.ontoware.rdf2go.model.Model model,
          String topicUsed)
        Send a Model to a specific topic.

      • notify

        void notify(String notifPayload)
        Send a String payload to the default topic. The payload must be formatted in the default RDF syntax from Event.WSN_MSG_DEFAULT_SYNTAX .

      • notify

        void notify(String notifPayload,
          String topicUsed)
        Send a String payload to a specific topic. The payload must be formatted in the default RDF syntax from Event.WSN_MSG_DEFAULT_SYNTAX .

      • notify

        void notify(String notifPayload,
          String topicUsed,
          String notifMediatype)
        Send a String payload to a specific topic.

      • getNotifyEndpoint

        String getNotifyEndpoint()
        Get the current notify endpoint.

      • setDefaultTopic

        void setDefaultTopic(String defaultTopic)
        Set the default topic to be used when no topic is specified with a notify method.
        Parameters:
        defaultTopic -

      • setNoNetworking

        void setNoNetworking(Boolean offline)
        For debugging purposes: do not actually send a notification if set to true.
